projects.title: Compact - All-In-One Organizer
projects.description: A simplicity-driven app that provides users an encompassing experience of productivity, featuring customizable widgets like To-Do, Budgeting, Addictions, Diary, and more.

projects.title: LinearPlot3D
projects.description: LinearPlot3D is a web application that displays animation to help students understand the concept of linear algebra in 3D space and professors to teach the concept of linear algebra in 3D space.

projects.title: ClipboardHistory
projects.description: The app keeps track of textual clipboard history data and allows the user to copy previous clipboard data using ctrl + <number>
